text:
@PreetBharara Well let's see. This new coronavirus appears to require intensive medical treatment for 1 in 5 people. Somewhere between 1 in 50 and 1 in 25 people are currently dying from the virus. How many people do you know?

Trumps political opponents are still walking around unharmed. hmm?
